about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hello! I'm **Muzaffer Karafil**. I combine the discipline and precision from manufacturing with a passion for technology.
about.p2: I work in the **Paint Maintenance** team at Togg, and at the same time, I develop the **Meetly** project as a mobile and AI-focused product developer.
about.p3: I specialize in professional plugin development for **Unreal Engine** and **Unity**. Creating custom solutions for game engines, optimizing developers' workflows, and developing performant tools is my passion.
about.p4: Every plugin comes with modular architecture, performance-oriented design, and developer-friendly documentation. Cross-platform support and version control-friendly structure guarantee the success of your projects.

hero.title: ğŸ¯ BlueprintOutline
hero.subtitle: Unreal Engine Plugin
hero.description: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints. BlueprintOutline is a professional plugin that allows you to draw and visualize the outline of your Blueprints in Unreal Engine.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints with BlueprintOutline

treeNavigation.title: Tree-Based Navigation
treeNavigation.description: Visual tree view showing Event â†’ Branch/Sequence â†’ Nodes execution chains. Navigate complex Blueprint structures with ease.

jumpToNode.title: Jump to Node
jumpToNode.description: Double-click any item to zoom and focus on the node in the Blueprint editor. Instantly navigate to any part of your Blueprint.

smartFlowLanes.title: Smart Flow Lanes
smartFlowLanes.description: Lane overlay that highlights True/False, Sequence, and Switch paths with subtle bands and lane labels for better flow visualization.

searchFilters.title: Advanced Search & Filters
searchFilters.description: Real-time search with multiple filter options: Exec Only, Branch/Sequence, Latent nodes, Function Calls, Variable Get/Set, Custom Events, Pure Nodes, Event Dispatchers, Switch, MultiGate, Timeline, State Machine, and more.

macroExpansion.title: Macro/Collapsed Expansion
macroExpansion.description: Automatically expands Macros and Collapsed Graphs in the tree. See the full execution flow without manual expansion.

dataFlow.title: Data Flow Support
dataFlow.description: Shows important data nodes (Break Hit Result, Variable Get/Set, Cast) connected to execution flow for better understanding.

enhancedInput.title: Enhanced Input Support
enhancedInput.description: Enhanced Input Action nodes are properly detected and displayed with [EnhancedInput] meta labels.

nodeManagement.title: Node Management
nodeManagement.description: Rename Custom Event nodes, add/edit comments, and bookmark important nodes for quick access across Blueprints.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Ctrl+F (Focus search), Ctrl+R (Refresh), Ctrl+E/Ctrl+Shift+E (Expand/Collapse all), Ctrl+A (Select all), Ctrl+C (Copy tree), Esc (Clear search).

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Async build system with caching for responsive UI on complex Blueprints (1000+ nodes). Fast on large graphs with per-Blueprint caching.

autoRefresh.title: Auto-Refresh & Editor Sync
autoRefresh.description: Automatically refreshes when Blueprints are opened or recompiled. Selecting a node in the graph highlights it in the outline automatically.

colorCoded.title: Color-Coded Nodes
colorCoded.description: Each node type has a unique color for easy identification. Switch case labels are color-coded in the outline.

multiEditor.title: Multi-Editor Support
multiEditor.description: Each Blueprint Editor window gets its own panel. Panel automatically appears in every Blueprint Editor (embedded).

statePreservation.title: State Preservation
statePreservation.description: Tree expansion state is preserved during auto-refresh. Bookmarks and comments are saved across sessions.

localization.title: Full Localization
localization.description: English and Turkish support. Full localization for all UI elements and messages.

editorOnly.title: Editor-Only Operation
editorOnly.description: No runtime load. Works only in the editor, ensuring zero performance impact on packaged builds.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

hero.title: Decision Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Domain-agnostic decision stack for autonomous and AI-driven systems
hero.description: A contract-first set of independent cores: proposal generation, guards and modulation, operational health, evaluation and calibration, and optional execution orchestration. Navigate the roadmap below to understand what each part does and how to integrate them.

what.title: What is the Decision Ecosystem?
what.subtitle: One-sentence summary and design principles
what.oneSentence: The Decision Ecosystem is a domain-agnostic, contract-first stack for autonomous and AI-driven decision systems. Six independent cores depend only on decision-schema and communicate via shared types (Proposal, FinalDecision, PacketV2).
what.principle1: Contract-first: all cores depend only on decision-schema; no cross-core dependencies.
what.principle2: Domain-agnostic: core vocabulary is universal (event, signal, state, proposal, decision).
what.principle3: Fail-closed safety: guards are deterministic and ordered; safety violations trigger deny.
what.principle4: Measurable guarantees: invariants are testable; compatibility checks ensure contract compliance.

cores.title: The six cores
cores.subtitle: Each core has a single responsibility; they integrate only via the shared contract (decision-schema).

schema.io: Definition â†’ Used by all cores
schema.desc: Single Source of Truth (SSOT): defines types Proposal, FinalDecision, PacketV2 and trace keys. No runtime logicâ€”pure contract.

mdm.desc: Proposal generation: answers "What should we do?" Produces Proposal (action, confidence, reasons) from context and state.

dmc.desc: Guards and modulation: "Should we do it?" Applies ordered guards; fail-closed on violation. Outputs FinalDecision and MismatchInfo.

ops.desc: Operational health: penalty score, RED state â†’ deny actions. Monitors health and can override decisions (kill-switch).

eval.desc: Evidence generation: computes metrics and invariant checks from traces; calibration and reports.

exec.desc: Optional: executes FinalDecision with retries, timeouts, idempotency; fail-closed on exceptions; secret redaction.

dataflow.title: Data flow
dataflow.subtitle: From context and state to execution and evaluation.
dataflow.diagram:
Context + State
    â†“
[mdm-engine] â†’ Proposal
    â†“
[decision-modulation-core] â†’ FinalDecision
    â†“
[ops-health-core] â†’ Safety override (if needed)
    â†“
[execution-orchestration-core] â†’ Bounded execution (optional)
    â†“
Execution + Trace (PacketV2)
    â†“
[evaluation-calibration-core] â†’ Metrics + Reports
dataflow.note: Guards and ops-health can override or deny at any step. Traces are recorded for evaluation and calibration.

standards.title: Standards & governance
standards.subtitle: Release notes, tags, branches, and contract matrix.
standards.item1: Release notes: fixed section order (Summary, Compatibility, Security, Changes, Verification, Links); INV-REL-*.
standards.item2: Tag governance: tags are immutable; version must match pyproject.
standards.item3: Branch governance: main for release; dev/CI fallback (INV-GOV-1, INV-GOV-2).
standards.item4: Ecosystem contract matrix: dependency ranges and CI fallback tags for reproducibility.

p0.desc: Match Git tags to pyproject versions for all cores.

minimal.title: Minimal (single core)
minimal.desc: Using only mdm-engine to generate a Proposal from context.
minimal.code:
from mdm_engine.mdm.decision_engine import DecisionEngine
engine = DecisionEngine()
proposal = engine.propose(context)  # Proposal from decision-schema

fullstack.title: Full stack
fullstack.desc: Proposal â†’ guards â†’ health check â†’ execute â†’ record trace.
fullstack.code:
# 1. Generate proposal (mdm-engine)
# 2. Evaluate with guards (decision-modulation-core)
# 3. Check health / kill-switch (ops-health-core)
# 4. Execute (execution-orchestration-core or your code)
# 5. Record trace as PacketV2 (evaluation-calibration-core)

integration.title: Integration
integration.subtitle: Real API entry points (verified).
integration.note: See each core repo for full API and docs. Start with decision-schema for types and contract.

githubSection.title: Docs on GitHub (wiki-style)
githubSection.desc: Architecture, formulas, integration guide, and release notes live in the GitHub repos. Use them as the single source of truth; this page is a roadmap overview.

hero.title: ğŸ¯ BlueprintOutline
hero.subtitle: Unreal Engine Plugin
hero.description: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints. BlueprintOutline is a professional plugin that allows you to draw and visualize the outline of your Blueprints in Unreal Engine.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints with BlueprintOutline

visualization.title: Blueprint Outline Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize and better organize your Blueprint outlines. Understand complex Blueprint structures more easily.

customizable.title: Customizable Appearance
customizable.description: Customize the outline appearance to your needs. Change colors, line thickness, and other visual settings.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Runs with low overhead and does not affect your Blueprint performance. Works smoothly even in large projects.

integration.title: Editor Integration
integration.description: Fully integrated into Unreal Engine Editor. Directly usable in Blueprint Editor and easy installation.

modular.title: Modular Structure
modular.description: Easily extensible with modular architecture. Customizable and extensible according to your needs.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Supported on all Unreal Engine platforms.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

community.subtitle: Join the BlueprintOutline community, ask questions, and share feedback

features.title: Features

visualization.title: Blueprint Outline Visualization

customizable.title: Customizable Appearance
customizable.description: Customize the outline appearance to your needs. Change colors, line thickness, and other visual settings.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Runs with low overhead and does not affect your Blueprint performance. Works smoothly even in large projects.

integration.title: Editor Integration
integration.description: Fully integrated into Unreal Engine Editor. Directly usable in Blueprint Editor and easy installation.

modular.title: Modular Structure
modular.description: Easily extensible with modular architecture. Customizable and extensible according to your needs.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Supported on all Unreal Engine platforms.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints with BlueprintOutline

visualization.title: Blueprint Outline Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize and better organize your Blueprint outlines. Understand complex Blueprint structures more easily.

customizable.title: Customizable Appearance
customizable.description: Customize the outline appearance to your needs. Change colors, line thickness, and other visual settings.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Runs with low overhead and does not affect your Blueprint performance. Works smoothly even in large projects.

integration.title: Editor Integration
integration.description: Fully integrated into Unreal Engine Editor. Directly usable in Blueprint Editor and easy installation.

modular.title: Modular Structure
modular.description: Easily extensible with modular architecture. Customizable and extensible according to your needs.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Supported on all Unreal Engine platforms.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

hero.title: ğŸ¯ BlueprintOutline

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints with BlueprintOutline

visualization.title: Blueprint Outline Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize and better organize your Blueprint outlines. Understand complex Blueprint structures more easily.

customizable.title: Customizable Appearance
customizable.description: Customize the outline appearance to your needs. Change colors, line thickness, and other visual settings.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Runs with low overhead and does not affect your Blueprint performance. Works smoothly even in large projects.

integration.title: Editor Integration
integration.description: Fully integrated into Unreal Engine Editor. Directly usable in Blueprint Editor and easy installation.

modular.title: Modular Structure
modular.description: Easily extensible with modular architecture. Customizable and extensible according to your needs.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Supported on all Unreal Engine platforms.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints with BlueprintOutline

visualization.title: Blueprint Outline Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize and better organize your Blueprint outlines. Understand complex Blueprint structures more easily.

customizable.title: Customizable Appearance
customizable.description: Customize the outline appearance to your needs. Change colors, line thickness, and other visual settings.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Runs with low overhead and does not affect your Blueprint performance. Works smoothly even in large projects.

integration.title: Editor Integration
integration.description: Fully integrated into Unreal Engine Editor. Directly usable in Blueprint Editor and easy installation.

modular.title: Modular Structure
modular.description: Easily extensible with modular architecture. Customizable and extensible according to your needs.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Supported on all Unreal Engine platforms.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

hero.description: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints. BlueprintOutline is a professional plugin that allows you to draw and visualize the outline of your Blueprints in Unreal Engine.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Better organize and visualize your Blueprints with BlueprintOutline

visualization.title: Blueprint Outline Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize and better organize your Blueprint outlines. Understand complex Blueprint structures more easily.

customizable.title: Customizable Appearance
customizable.description: Customize the outline appearance to your needs. Change colors, line thickness, and other visual settings.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Runs with low overhead and does not affect your Blueprint performance. Works smoothly even in large projects.

integration.title: Editor Integration
integration.description: Fully integrated into Unreal Engine Editor. Directly usable in Blueprint Editor and easy installation.

modular.title: Modular Structure
modular.description: Easily extensible with modular architecture. Customizable and extensible according to your needs.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Supported on all Unreal Engine platforms.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: See how BlueprintOutline works

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Open Blueprint Editor and start using BlueprintOutline features. Outline visualization will be automatically active.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Join the BlueprintOutline community, ask questions, and share feedback

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add Unity Editor tools to your project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the Unity Editor plugin from FAB Asset Store or GitHub.

step2.title: 2. Import Unity Package
step2.description: In Unity Editor, select the downloaded .unitypackage file from Assets > Import Package > Custom Package menu and import it.

step3.title: 3. Check Editor Scripts
step3.description: Make sure Editor scripts are in the Editor folder. The Editor folder is automatically recognized by Unity.

step4.title: 4. Start Using
step4.description: Restart Unity Editor and access new tools from the Editor menu. Custom Inspectors and Editor Windows will be automatically active.

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add BlueprintOutline to your Unreal Engine project

step1.title: 1. Download the Plugin
step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

step2.title: 2. Copy to Plugin Folder
step2.description: Copy the downloaded plugin to your Unreal Engine project's Plugins folder.

step3.title: 3. Enable the Plugin
step3.description: In Unreal Engine Editor, find the BlueprintOutline plugin in Edit > Plugins menu and enable it. Restart the Editor.

step1.description: Download the BlueprintOutline plugin from GitHub or Unreal Engine Marketplace.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hello! I'm **Muzaffer Karafil**. I combine the discipline and precision from manufacturing with a passion for technology.
about.p2: I work in the **Paint Maintenance** team at Togg, and at the same time, I develop the **Meetly** project as a mobile and AI-focused product developer.
about.p3: I specialize in professional plugin development for **Unreal Engine** and **Unity**. Creating custom solutions for game engines, optimizing developers' workflows, and developing performant tools is my passion.
about.p4: Every plugin comes with modular architecture, performance-oriented design, and developer-friendly documentation. Cross-platform support and version control-friendly structure guarantee the success of your projects.
